Job Posting:165691 - Position: S25 Software Engineering Intern (California) 165691 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/05/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/16/2025 04:06 PM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Synopsys Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Software Engineering Intern (California) 165691 Co-op Position Sunnyvale, CA USA 4 months US 32.0 per hour for 0 Major List $32.00-$46.00 per hour Job Title: Software Engineering Intern Job ID: 8225 What You'll Be Doing: • Analyze complex problems and design solutions to address these problems. • Code & develop the project in Python/C++. • Test & debug developed solutions and document solutions for general use by other users. Collaborate with other team members in productization of solutions. • Who We Are: At Synopsys, we drive the innovations that shape the way the way we live and connect. Our technology drives the Era of Pervasive Intelligence, where smart tech and AI are seamlessly woven into daily life. From self-driving cars and health-monitoring smartwatches to renewable energy systems that efficiently distribute clean power, Synopsys creates high-performance silicon chips that help build a healthier, safer, and more sustainable world. Our mission is to fuel today's innovations and spark tomorrow's creativity. Together, we embrace a growth mindset, empower one another, and collaborate to achieve our shared goals. Every day, we live by our values of Integrity, Excellence, Leadership, and Passion, fostering an inclusive culture where everyone can thrive - both at work and beyond. Internship Experience: This internship position will provide you with an excellent opportunity to work with our software team (part of Embedded Memory Team), which develops tools and flows used by a large team of Synopsys internal Memory Compiler engineers, spread all over the world to Design, Develop, QA and Release Memory IP. At Synopsys, interns dive into real-world projects, gaining hands-on experience while collaborating with our passionate teams worldwide - and having fun in the process! You'll have the freedom to share your ideas, unleash your creativity, and explore your interests. This is your opportunity to bring your solutions to life and work with cutting-edge technology that shapes not only the future of innovation but also your own career path. Join us and start shaping your future today! The base salary range across the U.S. for this position is $32.00-$46.00 per hour. In addition, this role may be eligible for bonus, equity, and other discretionary bonuses. Synopsys offers comprehensive wealth, wellness, and financial benefits as part of a competitive rewards package. The actual compensation offered will be based on a number of job-related factors, including location, skills, experience, and education. Your recruiter can share more specific details upon request. Job Requirements What You'll Need: • Currently pursuing a Bachelor's/Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field in the penultimate year of study. • Proficiency in Python and C++. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to analyze complex systems. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careers.synopsys.com/job/sunnyvale/software-engineering-intern/44408/74792444896 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
